forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
